results.title: Night sun = Il sole anche di notte
results.creator_credit: Vittorio Taviani, Paolo Taviani, Guiliani de Negri and Filmtre
results.brief_description: Based on Tolstoy’s short story “Father Sergius”, the Taviani brother’s “Night Sun” is a brooding portrait of one man’s search for truth. Baron Sergio Giuramondo (Julian Sands)is set for a comfortable life in the kings court when he discovers that the woman he is about to marry is the king’s mistress. He joins the priesthood, eventually becoming a monk with a growing reputation for saintliness. “Night Sun” is a beautiful film to watch, with plenty of lush italian palazzi settings and rural vistas of. Julian Sands is mesmerising as the tortured Father Sergius. In Italian with English subtitles.

results.title: Back to the future
results.creator_credit: Robert Zemeckis, Neil Canton, Bob Gale and Amblin Entertainment
results.brief_description: Marty McFly (Michael J Fox) and Doc (Christopher Lloyd) have to save the present by going back to the future in this classic from the 1980s.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Zemeckis, Neil Canton, Bob Gale and Amblin Entertainment
results.description: Michael J. Fox stars as Marty McFly, transported by his friend Doc’s time machine to 1955. Marty rubs shoulders with a much younger version of his parents and sees a side to them he never knew existed. The only problem is that the car responsible for sending him back to 1955 has run out of the plutonium required to fuel the car. Marty must convince Doc that his idea for a time machine, conceived in 1955 was a reality in the 1980s. As a further complication, Marty must ensure his parents-to-be meet and fall in love.

results.title: Freaky Friday
results.creator_credit: Gary Nelson, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: A young Jodie Foster stars as Annabel Andrews, a precocious 13 year old who experiences a Friday unlike any other. Annabel and her mother simultaneously switch identities. While Annabel’s mother struggles through her daughter’s typing exam, band practice and unusual eating habits, Annabel is faced with running the household and looking after her younger brother. Both discover the other’s life is not as easy as they first imagined and things change for the better when they regain their own identities. Based on the book by Mary Rodgers. Cast includes Barbara Harris, John Astin, Patsy kelly, Dick Van patten, Vicki Schreck.

results.title: Kolya
results.creator_credit: Jan Sverak, Eric Abraham, Pandora Cinema, Ceska televize, Portobello Pictures and Biograf Jan Sverak
results.brief_description: Louka is a middle-aged Czech who loves women, hates the idea of commitment and owes more money than he can earn playing the cello in a funeral orchestra. When a friend suggests he make a little ‘easy money’ by entering into an arranged marriage, with a Russian woman seeking citizenship, Louka reluctantly agrees. But it’s a decision that will throw his life into chaos…and change it forever. When the marriage is completed his new ‘wife’ is on the first plane to Germany leaving behind her five year old son for Louka to care for. So now this confirmed bachelor must become a father.. this grumpy old man and an innocent kid must learn to live together, even though they don’t speak the same language. This is a funny, touching and unforgettable story that will touch your heart. Winner of the Academy Award for Best Foreign Film. Contains Czech and Russian language with English subtitles.

results.title: Michael Collins
results.creator_credit: Neil Jordan, Redmond Morris, Stephen Woolley and Geffen Pictures
results.brief_description: Ireland 1916, His dreams inspired hope, his words ignited passion and his courage forged a nation’s destiny. “Michael Collins” (Liam Neeson) is the story of a real-life patriot whose bravery and unswerving dedication to the Irish people changed history as it made him into a legend. Collins quest would bring a man raised on war into an even more dangerous battle for peace. It would cost him his life and make him a hero for the ages. This film encompasses romance, violence, valour, rage, burning hope and fiery tragedy. The performances given by Liam Neeson, Alan Rickman, Stephen Rea, Julia Roberts, Aidan Quinn and Charles Dance are superb and linger long after the movie finishes.

results.title: Chocky
results.creator_credit: Vic Hughes, Christopher Hodson and Thorn EMI
results.brief_description: Matthew Gore’s life is just like any other 12 year olds, until he meets ‘Chocky’. What makes Chocky different from Matthew’s other friends is that she cannot be seen, speaks inside Matthew’s head and is an explorer from another world. Matthew develops new physical and mental capabilities through Chocky’s guidance, however it also isolates him from family and friends and eventually throws him into the media spotlight. Matthew is forced to make some adult decisions about his unique friend and their relationship. Based on the novel by renowned science fiction writer John Wyndham.

results.title: The Rescuers
results.creator_credit: Art Stevens, John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: Courageous rescues are the specialty of secret agent mice, Bernard and Bianca. An innocent orphan named Penny is kidnapped by Madame Medusa, a wickedly wacky villainess. Madame Medusa needs Penny to recover a priceless jewel. Bernard and Bianca set out to save Penny from Madame Medusa’s evil clutches. Voices are provided by Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor and Geraldine Page. Animated.

results.title: The Karate kid
results.creator_credit: John G. Avildsen, Jerry Weintraub and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: Daniel, a fatherless teenager, arrives in Los Angeles from the East Coast and faces the difficult task of making new friends. He becomes the object of bullying by a menacing gang of karate students, the Cobras, when he strikes up a relationship with the leader’s ex-girlfriend, Ali. Daniel’s handyman, Miyagi, a master of martial arts teaches him karate and that fighting is always the last answer to a problem. Daniel learns that karate is a mastery over the self, mind and body, and develops physical skills as well as faith and self-confidence.

results.title: Flight of the navigator
results.creator_credit: Randal Kleiser, Dimitri Villard, Robby Wald, New Star Entertainment, Viking Film and PSO
results.brief_description: A 12 year old boy is mysteriously abducted by an alien ship and returns to earth eight years later, still only 12. He now possesses great navigational powers that enable him to fly his spaceship anywhere he desires. Along with the robotic commander Max and mascot Puckmarin, David encounters an adventure of extraterrestrial proportions. Based on the story by Mark H. Baxter. Cast includes Joey Cramer, Sarah Jessica Parker, Veronica Cartwright, Cliff de Young, Matt Adler, Howard Hesseman.

results.title: Fluteman
results.creator_credit: Peter Maxwell, Brendon Lunney and Independent Productions (AU)
results.brief_description: Minyaka is a town in need of miracles and happiness. Desperate for water and ruled by dishonest councillors they cannot even afford a swimming pool. A mysterious stranger, known only as the ‘Fluteman’ promises that he can create rain, for a cost. The councillors, (not believing his promise) agree to the sum of $5,000. The Fluteman creates rain, much the the relief of Minyaka. The councillors refuse to pay the amount promised however and Fluteman, like the Pied Piper of Hamelin, leads the children out of town in retaliation. Only a young school teacher with the assistance of her mute student can locate the children and expose the councillors to the rest of the township.
